Package by.rozmysl.booking.model.dao.user

Interface BookingDao

All Superinterfaces:
Dao<Booking,​java.lang.Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingDaoImp
public interface BookingDao
extends Dao<Booking,​java.lang.Long>
Provides the base model DAO interface for `BOOKING` table.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changeRoom​(long bookingId, int roomId, DaoFactory dao)
    Changes the Room in the User's Booking in the `BOOKING` table
    void changeStatusBooking​(long bookingId, java.lang.String status, DaoFactory dao)
    Changes the User's Booking status in the `BOOKING` table
    int countBookingsPages​(int rows)
    Counts the number of pages in the 'BOOKING` table

    Searches for all Bookings between two dates in the `BOOKING` table
    java.util.List<Booking> findAllByUser​(java.lang.String user)
    Search for all Bookings made by the user in the `BOOKING` table

      Returns:

      java.sql.SQLException - if there was an error accessing the database

    • changeStatusBooking

      void changeStatusBooking​(long bookingId, java.lang.String status, DaoFactory dao) throws java.io.IOException, javax.mail.MessagingException, java.sql.SQLException
      Changes the User's Booking status in the `BOOKING` table
      Parameters:
      bookingId - id of the Booking
      status - booking status
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there was an error accessing the database
      javax.mail.MessagingException - if the message cannot be created
      java.io.IOException - if the letter cannot be created
